titleStmt.title: The tree of faith: or, The tree of life, springing up in the paradise of God; : from which all the wonders of the new Creation, in the virgin church of the first-born of wisdom must proceed. / By J. Lead.
titleStmt.author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by J. Bradford, in Fewen-Street, near Crowder's-Well,

notesStmt.note: "The ark of faith: or A supplement to The tree of faith, &c." ([12], 23 [i.e. 32] p. at end) has special title page and separate paging.
P. [122] misprinted as 222; p. [32] at end misprinted as 23.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
